Articles.Content:
Recently I made a rocket using the nova punch pack and I was trying to go to the mun. Once I was in orbit around Kerbin I started my munar-injection burn. I had SAS on but a few seconds into the burn my ship started rotating randomly. Anyone know why this happened?

PS My ship was a bit wobbly but I'm not sure if that has anything to do with it
Can you post a picture or a .craft file? It is really hard to guess what happened without seeing the craft. Was it an ASAS module or SAS module you were using as well?
It was an ASAS module. I also forgot to mention that I was using Carts mod and I had a rover on the ship

Stupid question, but it happened to me: did you have landing legs deployed below the engines?

I learnt the hard way about action and opposite reaction.
I'm pretty sure I did not have landing legs below the engine. Could a gimbaling engine have anything to do with it?

You do know ASAS isn't a gyroscope, right? I understand you're trying to make a nice, realistic looking rocket, but throw some winglets and/or a set of RCS, as ASAS is just SAS if it dosen\'t have anything to give command to, like other SAS modules, RCS, and Winglets.
Yea stick some RCS on there and it should stabilise it!
